overview:
Mrs Kate Crow has held senior management positions for over 14 years with responsibility for internal company operations. These have included finance, project monitoring, personnel and staff development, information technology and logistics. Kate has worked in a diverse range of industry sectors such as consulting actuaries, software houses and training providers.

More recently Kate has built her own consultancy providing data management and process support mainly to the pharmaceutical sector. Projects such as sales force management, vigilance systems, post marketing patients programs and asset management have been undertaken. Kate now joins Biofisica to ensure that the company has a solid foundation to support the product launch and the growth of the company into the future.
